data.name: Alice
data.text:
比如说逻辑回归。可以这么画
```python
ggplot(data = data, aes(x=x, y=y,color = factor(xxx))) + 
  geom_point(shape=1) + xlab('factor') + ylab('Fitted Value') + 
  geom_smooth(method = 'glm',method.args=list(family="binomial"),se = FALSE)
```

data.name: Bob
data.text:
图例可以用legend，例如
```R
legend("topleft",
+legend=c("Classic","Improved"),
+col=c("red","blue"),
+lty=1,lwd=2)
#topleft表示图例在左上角
#legend表示图例内容
#col表示颜色
#lty，lwd表示图例框长宽
